original_text: When Darius had been king of Persia for two years, Zechariah the prophet heard a message from the Lord. It was the eighth month of the year. Zechariah was the son of Berekiah, and Berekiah was the son of Iddo.
korean_text: 다리오 왕 제이년 여덟째 달에 여호와의 말씀이 잇도의 손자 베레갸의 아들 선지자 스가랴에게 임하니라 이르시되

sentences.original_text: When Darius had been king of Persia for two years
sentences.korean_translation: 다리우스가 페르시아 왕이 된 지 이년이 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: Zechariah the prophet heard a message from the Lord
It was the eighth month of the year
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그 해의 여덟 번째 달이었습니다

sentences.original_text: Zechariah was the son of Berekiah
and Berekiah was the son of Iddo
